title: Jennifer Aniston and Reese Witherspoon show off their impressive skills as anchors on GMA
text:
Their new Apple TV+ web series The Morning Show is set to premiere on Friday.

And Jennifer Aniston and Reese Witherspoon were on hand at Good Morning America in New York City to promote their upcoming show.

The movie stars took it one step further as they stepped in as the morning hosts on the daily news broadcast.

Good Morning, America: Jennifer Aniston and Reese Witherspoon were on hand at Good Morning America to promote their upcoming show

Jennifer plays newsreader Alex Levy on The Morning Show while Reese plays Bradley Jackson, an aspiring journalist who wants to take her job.

For the Monday broadcast, Jennifer and Reese co-anchored the show with a live studio audience - complete with them sitting in anchor chairs on the show with their Good Morning America coffee cups.

Jennifer kicked off the show with: 'Good Morning America. Hello to all of you at home. I'm Jennifer Aniston.'

'And I'm Reese Witherspoon. We have a great audience,' as the crowd went wild.

In character: Jennifer plays newsreader Alex Levy on The Morning Show while Reese plays Bradley Jackson, an aspiring journalist who wants to take her job

The Morning Show is about a popular news program based in New York City that has incredible ratings - until one of the co-anchors, Steve Carell's character Mitch Kessler - is fired for a sexual misconduct scandal.

After his exist, Jennifer's character Alex goes head to head against rival Bradley, played by Reese, as she fights to keep her job as a top newsreader on the show.

The Apple TV+ series was inspired by the book Top Of The Morning: Inside the Cutthroat World of Morning TV, by journalist Brian Stelter.

Billy Crudup, Mark Duplass and Gugu Mbatha-Raw co-star alongside Jennifer, Reese and Steve in the upcoming series.

The Morning Show debuts on Friday, November 1 on Apple TV+.
